reviews.review:
はるかむかし架空の1950年台9人のおじさん(+3爺)が長い長い戦いをしていた
一人は医療に賢く 一人はデブで強く 一人はメカに強く 一人はロケット狂
 一人は放火魔 一人は姑息 一人は狙撃手 一人は爆弾で守り 一人はすばやい

おじさんたちは激しく 敵の攻め立てる荒野を 力を合わせ超えることにした
一人は銃を作り 一人はそれを撃ち 二人は爆破し 一人は燃やし 一人は待機し
 二人は変装し 一人はすばやい

医療に賢いおじさんはとうとう姿を見せなかったのだ

変装おじさんは謎の人気で 足を引っ張ったのだ
初心者にはオススメ出来なくなったのだ

みんなもメディックやろう！たのしいよ！
未だに生き残っていることから日本語で遊べる最後のドンパチチームゲームとおもいます
無料なので試してみては。変装おじさんと狙撃手だけは勘弁な！

In my opinion it is still one of valves best games ever even after 10 years. There are so many cool hats and cosmetics. So many gamemodes,even community gamemodes like randomizer. There is a lot of support from the community. A lot of items come from the community which is great. Every second thousands of people play the game . For me it never gets boring. The funny taunts are something not many shoooters have  and it is just great that one has. Overall a great game with lost of unusual things for shooters , the only thing which is kinda bad is sometimes these long load times

Kokonaisuutena Team Fortress 2 on kiinnostavin verkkomoninpeli pitkään aikaan. Se on harkittu, tyylikäs ja hallitussa kaaoksessaan tuottaa tilanteita, jotka aidosti pakottavat nauramaan. 

Team Fortress 2:n odotusaika on ollut pitkä, mutta lopputuloksen valossa kehityskaari on ollut oikeutettu. TF2 on lähes loputon lähde kertomuksille yllättävistä tapahtumasarjoista, nurin kääntyneestä sotaonnesta ja puhtaasta pitelemättömästä sekasorrosta. 

Kun näillä kertomuksilla haluaa piinata asiasta mitään tietämättömiä kanssaihmisiään, on selvää, että pelissä on tehty jotain oikein.
Valve tries its hardest to kill this game, but it won't die.
its good game but dont give up to early because theres always something to do.

this game stole my life
i don't like it anymore >:(

Team Fortress 2 is war-themed class-based hat simulator. With 9 classes to choose from, you can always have fun. These 9 classes being, Soldier, Scout, Pyro, Demo, Heavy, Engineer, Medic, Sniper and Spy. All have varying play styles and endless fun awaits. Keep in mind though, this game takes a lot of space on your computer and once installed has a high skill cap for each class. Meaning, in some games, you can be completely destroyed by someone who has 3 years experience over you. However, once you get the hang of things, all that awaits you is a huge learning curve and you can be the best to!

i have played this game since 2012 my freind said that i should get it because it was for free. i thought this was going to be one of those call of duty copies that are even worst then the game already was but after i played for aproxx five hours i have found my try beloved player the engineer from then on foward i played engineer practising how to become better and more versitle in every map i found i was always looking for spots that would help me and my team. after a year of plying i quit because of how bad it was doing (in my opinion) then in 2015 i came back and it was alot different than before gun mettle came out tough break aswell and others that i cnt remember the date of when they came out. but just after istarted to get my mojo back the meet your match came in 2016 it wasnt a big deal it was almost an improvment. but as i kept on playing i started to notice that it became more unbalenced every match i joined until it was almost unenjoyable i started to lose my mojo again which made me sad my love for engie was lost because of how quick the matches were most people would leave the game because of how crappy the teams were aleast to make things fair is to maybe add players to the game mid round to the osing team so it made i a bit more balnced. but alas i couldnt play the game anyore without leaving out of bordom. its like if the medic never existed matches would be very quick and the game would probs not be so populare anyymore. and this is exactly whats happening i really didnt want to not recomend this game but i hve no choice and i cant take any more losses of the same kind of team over and over again so im gonna give it a 2/10 1 because the weapons are awsoe but that doesnt stop how unbalenced the teams are and 2 for the many hats and costues you can have. i for now unreccomend tf2 and ill be waiting for about a year or two until i come back to see the state of it again. VALVE IF THIS KEEPS UP I HIGHLY DOUBT THAT THE FUTRUE OF TF2 WILL BE NO MORE THAN A PAY TO WIN GAME. (until we meet again valve, until we meet again)

This is the perfect game for people who likes first person shooters. but prepare to spend a bit of money on cosmetics and other weapons.

I absolutely LOVE Team Fortress 2, and if you argue it is dead then you are hilariously wrong.

[h1]What I think about TF2[/h1]

Team Fortress 2 is a game above many others, it stands out with witty character design and a wide arrangement of play styles. You can mix and match weapons to your liking to really spice up the game or go default and play the game as it was set to be. You can customize your players, chat with friends and even shoot up some giant robots! With many community servers and game modes, you will be playing for hours on end, unable to stop and having lots of fun! It does take a bit to get used to the game, but once your down pat with how it's played, you can really go on some huge killing sprees and be the best player on the server! You can also play on a competitive game mode if you really want to get some kind of challenge, or go casual and get comfortable. The only thing bad I can say about Team Fortress is that there are some hidden commands that could help you make Team Fortress 2 more comfortable such as viewmodel_fov, however you could probably learn that from your friends or find out yourself.

[h1]Is Team Fortress 2 dead?[/h1]

Hell no! Team Fortress 2 is far from dead, with over 500,000 players still playing everyday and counting! The only thing that may hurt it is it's community updates, however the reason why they are so low quality is because there are not many developers on the team currently. With only 4-5 programmers and a huge game like this one, there is for sure some things that might be bad, however you have to be patient and be sympathetic and understanding of them.

Not only do I love this game to bits, but will be sure to play it even when no one wants to play anymore! With over 2000 hours and counting, this game is a pure masterpiece and can be enjoyed for hours upon hours on end! Thank you for reading my review, now pick this game up, and get ready to have the time of your life!

Meu amigo eu tenho quase 1k de horas desse jogo e  como ele me faz feliz eu jogo ele todos os dias
meu bom você não entende esse jogo e bom é do krl mesmo eu nem sei como dizem que ele esta morrendo (minha opnião)

Pontos Negativos
* Jogadores novos ''F2P's'' são massacrados e comidos com leite de manhã pelos os veteranos
* Mapas super confusos ate eu me perco jogando as vezes
* Todo mundo vota sempre no pior mapa possível
* Tem tutorial não obrigatório  mas eu acho que deveria ser muitas pessoas não sabem soltar uma uber
* Mapas as vezes com lados idênticos
* Competitivo pelo menos no BR morto
* Quase Ninguém coopera
* Tem spam mic

Pontos Positivos
* Vários estilos de Jogo
* Tem vários memes
* Varias opções de customização
* Bem dinâmico 
* Uma boa partida  (da aquelas bem equilibradas são muito boas de se jogar)
* Comunidade Fiel e participativa
* Todo mundo ama
* Pootis
* 42 Mapas para sua escolha

O jogo já está a dois anos sem um Update muito grande.

Após jogando quase exatamente 4 anos. Voltei a jogar com frequência, eles aumentaram o nivel do casual. agora podemos acalçar 150 LVL Patente 8 ou seja, nivel 800. Team Fortress 2 não é repetitivo mas é uma montanha a ser escalada principalmente quando se jogar sozinho. É desafiador e muito um dos melhores gratuitos que essa loja virtual já teve.

Tf2 is a pretty fun game. It offers a lot of gameplay with lots of different maps and tons of game modes. I would definitely recommend this game to you if you're into fps. But, even though this is a free to play game... Many people tend to buy items with money in game.  So if you have a pocket change, i would recommend you to atleast buy a key or any item in the game. When you buy something in game, you will be able to trade, play mvm, and get items easier. There are lots of incentives when you become a P2P so i would recommend to do so if you play the game.
